data.title: 2 Players On Motorstorm
data.meta_description: Hi My Son Has Just Got A Ps3 For Christmas And We've Been Trying To Get On 2 Players On Motorstorm But With No Luck.can Somebody Please Tell Us What We Are Doing Wrong.
data.text:
motorstorm 2 or 1 ???

MS1 doesnt support 2 player, only single or online.

MS2, I'm sure was fairly straightforward (sorry if it isnt) as my 5yo son sets it up all the time <<< dont want you to feel bad over this, he's enquisitive.

0

But When U Load The Game And Go Onto Play It Shows U The Tickets Lets U Choose Ure Vehicle Then It Only Seems To Be 1 Player

0

Thanks 4 That.can't Say Ive Seen That In The Menu Though ( Sorry If I Seem Thick Just That Its Driving Us Mental Trying 2 Get On It )

0

It's not the clearest thing, to be honest - it's under Wreckreation - how were you suppposed to know?

I still can't believe MotorStorm isn't a two-player. You'd have thought that's what they'd have been aiming for. :eek:

0

This Might Sound Stupid But Weres Wreckreation In The Menu ?

Ok, I've just loaded this up.

The main menu when game starts offers

Festival

wreckreation

options

something else

selecting wreck (as said) offers "split screen" for which you either need to have your other controllers turned on or it will ask you to turn them on.

0

But When U Load The Game And Go Onto Play It Shows U The Tickets Lets U Choose Ure Vehicle Then It Only Seems To Be 1 Player

Paul, you might want to cut out the 'txt spk' - it asks in the posting tips that it's not used, and not to mention it looks daft as we're not limited in how many characters we can use on the forum like you would be in a text message.

0
